name: Dale The Snail: Roots of Revenge
name_original: Dale The Snail: Roots of Revenge
description:
Controls:

Keyboard

  • WASD / arrows to navigate
  • Space to Roll / Attack
  • J + K or Left + Right mouse to toggle / cycle targeting
  • Mouse look

Gamepad

  • Left stick navigate
  • Right stick look
  • Right trigger roll / attack
  • Right / left bumper to toggle / cycle targeting

DALE THE SNAIL: Roots Of Revenge 

CONCEIVED AND PRODUCED IN NINE DAYS FOR GGJ 2023

FEATURING THE TALENTS OF:
